content:
Yes, Drew Brees holds several Super Bowl records. Here are a few:

1. Highest completion percentage in a single Super Bowl game: 82.1% (Super Bowl XLIV)
2. Most completions in a single Super Bowl game: 32 (Super Bowl XLIV)
3. Most passes attempted in a single Super Bowl game without an interception: 39 (Super Bowl XLIV)
4. Most career completions in Super Bowl history: 103
5. Most career passing yards in Super Bowl history: 1,129
6. Most career touchdown passes in Super Bowl history: 9

These records cement Drew Brees as one of the greatest quarterbacks in Super Bowl history.
